description: This file declares a C++ interface (ILocalStore) for local storage operations, including methods for opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving counts and entries, removing entries, and adding entries.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for local storage operations, defining methods for managing tables and entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the storage at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table with the given name.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in the specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Returns the count of entries in the table starting from a specific point.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting from a specific position.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table between start and end indices.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
